text: health should always be everyone's
number-one concern and right now we are
officially living in a pandemic as I
speak this there have been a hundred and
fifty-one thousand cases of the corona
virus across a hundred and fifty-one
countries and it has taken the lives of
fifty eight hundred people the global
economy is in the biggest recession
since 2009 and will most probably be
worse stock markets have plummeted
retail shops are closing and all sports
are canceled but no industry has been
hit harder than travel and hospitality
airlines are projected to lose over two
hundred billion dollars in revenue if
nobody is flying that nobody is staying
in hotels nobody is taking taxis eating
in restaurants or shopping at malls this
is the problem when I speak with others
about the virus I feel like their
opinions are one extreme or the other
some people think that it's no big deal
while others think that the world is
ending if you ask me I fall somewhere in
the middle for the entirety of the
outbreak I've been travelling first I
was in Hong Kong then the Philippines
then Myanmar Dominican Republic Panama
and now I just got back home into the US
last week we just sat down at
chick-fil-a my favorite fast food is the
one that I cleared the most I've
witnessed other countries handled this
the right way like Hong Kong the
government was transparent temperature
checks were everywhere strict quarantine
was implemented and people were
proactive about getting tested as a
result there was less fear less panic
and they essentially overcame the virus
and then we have the United States who
are late to the party and oh my god it's
like an apocalypse here so I'm shopping
now at Target and behind me is the
toilet paper section and as you can see
it's completely empty the toilet paper
and soap crisis is in full effect
can someone explain this to me if you
hoard all the hand sanitizer then you'll
be infected by others who aren't able to
wash their hands I'm predicting that the
situation in the US will continue to get
worse because it's such a big country
and so few people have been tested the
official number of cases is that 2600
but it could well be
over fifty or a hundred thousand nobody
really knows everyone in the world right
now it needs to be taking extra
precautions not to spread this thing
wash your hands with soap ten times a
day and stay away from close contact
with others it's inevitable people that
we know and love like Tom Hanks are
going to have it and we must all be
prepared but let me please tell you that
the world is not over this is not the
Black Plague and I don't think we should
all panic caution yes panic No
mentally prepare yourself for what's to
come and don't read CNN every day or
you're gonna drive yourself nuts human
beings are resilient there's always a
way to recover and bounce back a lot of
uncertainties still remain but we will
come through and this virus will soon be
in the history books I like to stay
optimistic maybe a vaccine will be
discovered next month or perhaps warmer
weather could eradicate this thing by
summer no matter what it's important
that we all work together like Hong Kong
and China to get this thing finished in
terms of travel I would advise everyone
right now to stop and take a break it's
exactly what I'm doing right now at my
home in Arizona and I have canceled my
trip next week to Boston and New York
and I'm planning to stay here at least
for the next few weeks why not take this
as an opportunity to spend quality time
with your friends and family or explore
your backyard a little more if you want
to travel then heading out in nature is
not going to hurt anyone visit nearby
beaches mountains or forests you won't
get infected from them so everyone stays
safe stay clean stay positive and let's
all do our part to get out of this
horrible situation and back to normal
life where everyone is healthy again
please guys comment below I would love
to hear your thoughts on the corona
virus what you can do if I fail to say
something in this video I would love to
hear it from you I will be reading your
comments I encourage all you guys to do
the same thank you for watching and I'll
see you guys tomorrow
[Music]
I'm drew pinsky and if you like my
travel videos please click Subscribe and
join me as I plan to visit every country
in the world
